get.summary: Fetch Global Processed Reports by Month
get.description:
Retrieves a list of processed reports for the specified month. The monthYear should be in the format MM-YYYY.
This endpoint allows clients to access historical processing data for a specific month.

get.summary: Fetch Processed Reports by Month
get.description:
Retrieves a list of processed reports for the specified charging station and month. The monthYear should be in the format MM-YYYY.
This endpoint allows clients to access historical processing data for a specific charging station.

get.summary: Get Charging Stations paginated based on criteria filters.
get.description:
Searches for Charging Stations based on provided criteria.
 #### If a criteria filter is not provided, it will not be used in the search.
 #### If multiple criteria filters are provided, the search will only return results that match any of the provided criteria.
 #### Results are paginated based on the provided page number and page size.
 #### The page number is zero-based, meaning the first page is 0. The page size determines how many records are returned per page.

parameters.name: searchValue
parameters.description: The value which we need to search for charging station name or evseId of a charging point

parameters.name: chargingHubUid
parameters.description: Charging Hub Uid which the charging station is associated

get.summary: Get Charging Sessions paginated based on criteria filters.
get.description:
Searches for charging sessions based on provided criteria.
 #### If a criteria filter is not provided, it will not be used in the search.
 #### If multiple criteria filters are provided, the search will only return results that match any of the provided criteria.
 #### Results are paginated based on the provided page number and page size.
 #### The page number is zero-based, meaning the first page is 0. The page size determines how many records are returned per page.

parameters.name: searchValue
parameters.description: The value to search for charging session id or EmaId

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: A list of all charging periods of this charging session.

parameters.name: tariffType
parameters.description: Reason (OCPP) for ending the charging session.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: The Date/Time when this charging sessions starts, in UTC.

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: The Date/Time when this charging sessions ends, in UTC.

get.summary: Fetch Processed Reports by Month
get.description:
Retrieves a list of processed reports for the specified charging hub and month. The monthYear should be in the format MM-YYYY.
This endpoint allows clients to access historical processing data for a specific charging hub.

get.summary: Get paginated Charging Stations associated to a specific ChargingHub.
get.description: Retrieves Charging Stations associated to a specific ChargingHub.

parameters.name: chargingHubUid
parameters.description: Existent Charging Hub ID provided by CPO and used to mapping with internal id.

get.summary: Get Charging Hubs paginated based on criteria filters.
get.description:
Searches for charging hubs based on provided criteria.
 #### If a criteria filter is not provided, it will not be used in the search.
 #### If multiple criteria filters are provided, the search will only return results that match any of the provided criteria.
 #### Results are paginated based on the provided page number and page size.
 #### The page number is zero-based, meaning the first page is 0. The page size determines how many records are returned per page.

parameters.name: searchValue
parameters.description: The search value for searching for charging hub id, name or address

get.summary: Get Charging Hubs overview.
get.description: Returns list of charging hubs with name and uid.

description.example: Parking fee in ct per hour [h].

cost.description: Additional net fee/ net cost (without VAT) value in described unit.

providerGroup.description: Unique BDEW code of the provider group in question. 5 uppercase characters long, starting with 2 letters.

cost.description: net cost (without VAT) in cents [ct] per kilowatt hour [kWh].

validFrom.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSZ' formatted UTC datetime for when the charge access started being valid.

validTo.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSZ' formatted UTC datetime for when the charge access expired.

contractualBasis.description: Enum that represents the contractual basis for charge access at a charging hub.

reasoningDifferentCosts.description: Reason why the provider group has a different fee than all others.

averageSpeedOfAnswer.description: Average speed of answer in seconds [s].

rating.description: Average customer charging hub rating in german school grades (1 = best, 6 = worst).

EditHotlineRatingReportRequest.description: Reporting the raw Rating at a charging hub.

renewedComponents.description: Set of renewed charging point components. At least one element must be provided.

start.description: The Date/Time when  the renewal work has started/will start. In UTC

end.description: The Date/Time when the renewal work was finished/is scheduled to finish. In UTC

EditChargingPointRenewalReportRequest.description: Reporting the raw renewal at a charging point.

chargePointComponent.description: Enum that represents a component of an charging point.

reason.description: Enum that represents a reason for the renewal of the component.

RenewedComponent.description: JSON-formatted object that represents renewed component of a charging point.

rating.description: Average customer charging hub rating in german school grades (1 = best, 6 = worst)

totalComplaints.description: The amount of the received complaints for charging sessions at the charging point in question.

chargingHubUid.description: Charging Hub UID.

status.description: Enum that represents the status of a charge point defect that occurred at a charging point.

activities.description: Necessary activities for fixing the error.

additionalInformation.description: Enum that represents the type of error/defect that occurred at a charging point.

emergenceDate.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SS' formatted UTC datetime for when the damage emerged.

forecastDate.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SS' formatted UTC datetime for when the damage should be repaired.

fixDate.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SS' formatted UTC datetime for when the damage was repaired.

rating.description: Average customer charging hub rating in german school grades (1 = best, 6 = worst)

chargingHubUid.description: Existent Charging Hub UID provided by CPO and used to mapping with internal uid.

facilityType.description: Enum that represents a auxiliary facility that is available at a charging hub.

emergenceDate.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SS' formatted UTC datetime for when the damage emerged.

fixDate.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SS' formatted UTC datetime for when the damage was repaired.

forecastDate.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SS' formatted UTC datetime for when the damage should be repaired.

validTo.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSZ' formatted UTC datetime for when the charge access expired.

status.description: Enum that represents the status of a charge point defect that occurred at a charging point.

activities.description: Necessary activities for fixing the error.

EditProcessedChargingPointDefectsReportR.description: Reporting the charging point defects raw.

facilityType.description: Enum that represents a auxiliary facility that is available at a charging hub.

emergenceDate.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SS' formatted UTC datetime for when the damage emerged.

fixDate.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SS' formatted UTC datetime for when the damage was repaired.

name.description: The name of the Charging Station if no name given: <Model Name> + <Charger ID>

chargingHubUid.description: The uid of the Charging Hub for which Charging Station should be created

chargingStationVendor.description: This contains a value that identifies the vendor of the Charging Station

chargingStationVendorModel.description: The charging station model as specified by the vendor

latitude.description: Latitude of the point in decimal degree. Decimal separator: '.', Regex: -?[0-9]{1,2}\.[0-9]{5,7}

longitude.description: Longitude of the point in decimal degree. Decimal separator: '.' Regex: -?[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{5,7}

GeoLocation.description: This class defines the geo location of the Charge Point. The geodetic system to be used is WGS 84.

evseId.description: Unique EVSE ID of the form '{Country Code}{Spot Operator ID}{ID Type}{Power Outlet ID}'

status.description: Enum that represents the status of an charging point.

capabilities.description: List of capabilities of the charging point.

items.description: List of capabilities of the charging point.

connectors.description: Set of connectors offered by the charging point.

negligibleDefects.description: Flag that describes if the charging point currently has any negligible defects.

connectorUid.description:
Identifier of the Connector within the EVSE. Two Connectors may have the same id as long as
 they do not belong to the same EVSE object.

standard.description: The standard of the installed connector.

format.description: The format (socket/cable) of the installed connector.

voltage.description:
Maximum voltage of the connector (line to neutral for AC_3_PHASE), in volt [V]. For example:
DC Chargers might vary the voltage during charging when battery almost full.

amperage.description: Maximum amperage of the connector, in ampere [A].

maxPower.description:
Maximum electric power that can be delivered by this connector, in Watts (W). When the maximum
electric power is lower than the calculated value from voltage and amperage, this value should be set.
For example: A DC Charge Point which can delivers up to 920V and up to 400A can be limited to a maximum
of 150kW (max_electric_power = 150000). Depending on the car, it may supply max voltage or current, but not
both at the same time.
For AC Charge Points, the amount of phases used can also have influence on the maximum power.

ConnectorRequest.description:
A Connector is the socket or cable and plug available for the EV to use.
A single EVSE may provide multiple Connectors but only one of them can be in use at the same time.
A Connector always belongs to an EVSE object.

value.description: Value of the dimension consumed, measured according to the dimension type.

CdrDimension.description: List of relevant values for this charging period.

start.description: The Date/Time when this charging period starts, in UTC.

dimensions.description: List of relevant values for this charging period.

encodingMethod.description: The name of the encoding used in the signed data field of a signed value.

publicKey.description: Public key used to sign the data, base64 encoded.

ChargingPeriod.description: JSON-formatted object that represents a charging period of a charging session.

chargingHubUid.description: The uid of the Charging Hub connected with the Charging Session by Charging point

chargingPointUid.description: The uid of the Charging Point connected with the Charging Session

start.description: The Date/Time when this charging sessions starts, in UTC.

end.description: The Date/Time when this charging sessions ends, in UTC.

emaId.description: Partly hashed authentication ID of the driver. Country code and provider ID should not be hashed.

tariffType.description: Enum that represents the type of tariff of a charging session.

chargingPeriods.description: A list of all charging periods of this charging session.

totalCost.description: Total net cost (without VAT) of the charging session, including fixed costs, in Euro [] for B2B pricing.

totalEnergy.description: Total amount of charged energy in kilowatt hour [kWh].

totalParkingTime.description: Total parking time without any charging in seconds [s].

reason.description: Reason (OCPP) for ending the charging session.

nature.description:
Nature of the value, in other words, the event this value belongs to.
"Possible values at moment of writing:
  - Start (value at the start of the Session)
  - End (signed value at the end of the Session)
  - Intermediate (signed values take during the Session, after Start, before End)
Others might be added later.

plainData.description: The unencoded string of data. The format of the content depends on the EncodingMethod field.

signedData.description: Blob of signed data, base64 encoded. The format of the content depends on the EncodingMethod field.

SignedValue.description: This class contains the signed and the plain/unsigned data. By decoding the data, the receiver can check if the content has not been altered.

name.description: Six-digit contract manager ID of charging hub, hyphen and self-selected name.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the charging hub.

state.description: Enum that represents the german states using exactly 2 letters.

operator.description: Unique identifier of the responsible operator. Must be 5 alphanumeric digits.

owner.description: Unique identifier of charging hub owner.

auxiliaryFacilities.description: Set of facilities that are available at the charging hub.

items.description: Enum that represents a auxiliary facility that is available at a charging hub.

negligibleDamages.description: Flag that describes if there are any negligible damages at charging hub.

lastUpdated.description: Date this charging hub was last modified by the CPO provider

averageSpeedOfAnswer.description: Average speed of answer in seconds [s].

rating.description: Average customer charging hub rating in german school grades (1 = best, 6 = worst).

identityKey.description: The Identity Key of the Charging Station

chargingPointUid.description: The unique identifier of a Charging Point

renewalUid.description: The unique identifier of a Charging point renewal report

renewedComponents.description: Set of renewed charging point components. At least one element must be provided.

start.description: The Date/Time when  the renewal work has started/will start. In UTC

end.description: The Date/Time when the renewal work was finished/is scheduled to finish. In UTC

providerGroup.description: Unique BDEW code of the provider group in question. 5 uppercase characters long, starting with 2 letters.

cost.description: net cost (without VAT) in cents [ct] per kilowatt hour [kWh].

validFrom.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSZ' formatted UTC datetime for when the charge access started being valid.

validTo.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSZ' formatted UTC datetime for when the charge access expired.

contractualBasis.description: Enum that represents the contractual basis for charge access at a charging hub.

reasoningDifferentCosts.description: Reason why the provider group has a different fee than all others.

chargingHubUid.description: Charging Hub UID.

facilityType.description: Enum that represents a auxiliary facility that is available at a charging hub.

emergenceDate.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SS' formatted UTC datetime for when the damage emerged.

fixDate.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SS' formatted UTC datetime for when the damage was repaired.

forecastDate.description: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SS' formatted UTC datetime for when the damage should be repaired.

identityKey.description: The Identity Key of the Charging Station

name.description: The name of the Charging Station if no name given: <Model Name> + <Charger ID>

chargingStationVendor.description: This contains a value that identifies the vendor of the Charging Station

evseId.description: Unique EVSE ID of the form '{Country Code}{Spot Operator ID}{ID Type}{Power Outlet ID}'

status.description: Enum that represents the status of ancharging point.

capabilities.description: List of capabilities of the charging point.

items.description: List of capabilities of the charging point.

connectors.description: Set of connectors offered by the charging point.

negligibleDamages.description: Flag that describes if the charging point currently has any negligible defects.

connectorId.description: Identifier of the connector within the EVSE.

start.description: The Date/Time when this charging sessions starts, in UTC.

end.description: The Date/Time when this charging sessions ends, in UTC.

emaId.description: Partly hashed authentication ID of the driver. Country code and provider ID should not be hashed.

tariffType.description: Enum that represents the type of tariff of a charging session.

chargingPeriods.description: A list of all charging periods of this charging session.

totalCost.description: Total net cost (without VAT) of the charging session, including fixed costs, in Euro [] for B2B pricing.

totalEnergy.description: Total amount of charged energy in kilowatt hour [kWh].

totalParkingTime.description: Total parking time without any charging in seconds [s].

reason.description: Reason (OCPP) for ending the charging session.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the charging hub.

state.description: Enum that represents the german states using exactly 2 letters.

operator.description: Unique identifier of the responsible operator. Must be 5 alphanumeric digits.

owner.description: Unique identifier of charging hub owner.

auxiliaryFacilities.description: Set of facilities that are available at the charging hub.

items.description: Enum that represents a auxiliary facility that is available at a charging hub.

lastUpdated.description: Date this charging hub was last modified by the CPO provider

status.description: Enum that represents the status of an charging point.

capabilities.description: List of capabilities of the charging point.

ChargingStationShadowCore.description: Provides additional details about the charging station

connectorUid.description:
Identifier of the Connector within the EVSE. Two Connectors may have the same id as long as
 they do not belong to the same EVSE object.

standard.description: The standard of the installed connector.

format.description: The format (socket/cable) of the installed connector.

voltage.description:
Maximum voltage of the connector (line to neutral for AC_3_PHASE), in volt [V]. For example:
DC Chargers might vary the voltage during charging when battery almost full.

amperage.description: Maximum amperage of the connector, in ampere [A].

maxPower.description:
Maximum electric power that can be delivered by this connector, in Watts (W). When the maximum
electric power is lower than the calculated value from voltage and amperage, this value should be set.
For example: A DC Charge Point which can delivers up to 920V and up to 400A can be limited to a maximum
of 150kW (max_electric_power = 150000). Depending on the car, it may supply max voltage or current, but not
both at the same time.
For AC Charge Points, the amount of phases used can also have influence on the maximum power.

status.description: Status value during the scheduled period.

period_end.description: End of the scheduled period, if known.

StatusSchedule.description: This type is used to schedule status periods in the future. The eMSP can provide this information to the EV user for trip planning purposes. A period MAY have no end. Example: "This station will be running as of tomorrow. Today it is still planned and under construction."

uid.description: The unique identifier of the report.

lastModifiedDate.description: The date and time when the report was modified.
